properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Seeking for me for me (seeking for me) Seeking for me for me (seeking for me) Oh it was wonderful blest be His name Seeking for me for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my Savior to Bethlehem came Born in a manger to sorrow and shame Oh it was wonderful blest be His name Seeking for me for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my Savior on Calvary's tree Paid the great debt and my soul He set free Oh it was wonderful - how could it be Dying for me for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my Savior the same as of old While I was wand'ring afar from the fold Gently and long did He plead with my soul Calling for me for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my Savior shall come from on high Sweet is the promise as weary years fly Oh I shall see Him descend from the sky Coming for me for me{/lang-eng}
